Item ID8788

A Magic stone is used in the Construction skill to build very high level items in a Player-owned house. It is available from the Keldagrim stonemason for 975,000 coins each.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 November 2021

Magic stones were readded to the Keldagrim Stonemason.

24 November 2021
(update)

Magic stones were swapped with condensed gold in the Keldagrim Stonemason's stock.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When asking a servant to fetch materials from the bank, magic stone is listed as 'Magic housing stone'.
  • With the release of Condensed gold on 24 November 2021, magic stones were accidentally removed from the Keldagrim Stonemason's shop. This technically made them the first tradeable discontinued items in Old School RuneScape, until they were re-added to the shop two hours later.
